PageTitle: display mpls te cspf tedb srlg
FuncDef: The display mpls te cspf tedb srlg command displays information about CSPF-based TEDBs that meet specified conditions.
CLIs: display mpls te cspf tedb srlg <srlg-number>
display mpls te cspf tedb srlg
display mpls te cspf tedb srlg igp-type isis
display mpls te cspf tedb srlg igp-type ospf
display mpls te cspf tedb srlg <srlg-number> igp-type isis
display mpls te cspf tedb srlg <srlg-number> igp-type ospf

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the number of an SRLG to which an interface joins.
The value is an integer ranging from 0 to 4294967295.

Examples: <HUAWEI> display mpls te cspf tedb srlg
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The display mpls te cspf tedb srlg command displays information about CSPF-based TEDBs that meet specified conditions on the control board.
